messages.content: Comfyui-Gelbooru is a custom node for ComfyUI that allows users to retrieve random images from Gelbooru based on specified tags and other search criteria.
To install Comfyui-Gelbooru, navigate to the custom_nodes directory, run `git clone https://github.com/1mckw/Comfyui-Gelbooru.git`, and then restart ComfyUI.
Are the user and API key required for using Comfyui-Gelbooru?
No, the user and API key are optional when using Comfyui-Gelbooru.
How should tags be separated when using Comfyui-Gelbooru?
When using Comfyui-Gelbooru, tags should be separated by commas, and each tag must have a comma.
What happens to the image size when requesting multiple images using Comfyui-Gelbooru?
When requesting multiple images using Comfyui-Gelbooru, the image size will be the same as the first image.
Is there a suggested batch URLs to image node for use with Comfyui-Gelbooru?
Yes, the suggested batch URLs to image node for use with Comfyui-Gelbooru is available at https://github.com/wmatson/easy-comfy-nodes.
